topics.body: There is no greater cure for a sudden case of the blues than minestrone and Power Rangers.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
In a ideal situation, I would love to see G5 of MLP be a direct sequel series to FiM, and star the grown-up CMC going off on their own adventures and stories. Or if we're getting all-new characters, let's hope they're good enough on their own to take after the legacy the Mane Six left behind.

Because I'd hate to see the world of Equestria, and the characters that we all come to know and love thrown away for something not as good, or outright inferior in comparison. I'm not asking for an entire rehash of Friendship is Magic, but some sort of "continuous evolution".

_You know, kind of like what the Legend of Korra or Batman Beyond are in relation to Avatar the Last Airbender and Batman: The Animated Series respectively._
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000
